alert.note: Alert for Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:06AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Allamakee, southeastern Houston, western Vernon and northwestern Crawford Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 706 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of New Albin, or 11 miles south of Caledonia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Albin around 720 AM CDT. Lansing around 730 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Brinkman Ridge, Esofea, Red Mound, Spring Ridge, Rush Creek, County 5 And Peyton Road, Runge Hollow, Red Barn Campground, County Roads B And Y and Churchtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
